creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.EN: Charges in a straight line, pushing and damaging all creatures in a 3 cells wide path.
creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.FR: Charge en ligne droite, poussant et infligeant des dégâts à toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 3 cases.
creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.DE: Stürmt in einer geraden Linie vor. Stößt alle Kreaturen in einem 3 Felder breiten Pfad zurück und fügt ihnen Schaden zu.
creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.IT: Carica in linea retta, spostando e ferendo tutte le creature nel raggio di 3 caselle.
creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.ZH: 直线冲撞，在 3 格宽的路径上推动并伤害所有单位。
creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.ZH-TW: 按照直線衝鋒，將 3 格寬路線上所有的生物推開，並造成傷害。
creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.ES: Arremete en línea recta, de modo que empuja y daña a todas las criaturas en una trayectoria con una anchura de 3 casillas.
creatureAbility.dinobit_bulldozer.descri.PT: Corre em uma linha reta, empurrando e causando dano a todas as criaturas em um percurso de 3 células.

creatureAbility.bigBark.description.EN: A big bark that damages and pushes enemies out of the affected area.
creatureAbility.bigBark.description.FR: Un gros ouaf qui inflige des dégâts et repousse les enemis en dehors de la zone affectée.
creatureAbility.bigBark.description.DE: Ein lautes Bellen, das Kreaturen Schaden zufügt und sie 3 Felder zurückstößt. Gegner werden 3 Felder zurückgestoßen, Verbündete 1.
creatureAbility.bigBark.description.IT: Possente latrato che ferisce e respinge le creature di 3 caselle. Sposta i nemici di 3 caselle e gli alleati di 1 casella.
creatureAbility.bigBark.description.ZH: 发出愤怒狂吠，对生物造成伤害并将其推开 3 格。敌人会被推开 3 格，盟友会被推开 1 格。
creatureAbility.bigBark.description.ZH-TW: 大聲吼叫，傷害並將生物推開 3 格。敵人被推開 3 格，盟友被推開 1 格。
creatureAbility.bigBark.description.ES: Un gran ladrido que daña y aleja a las criaturas 3 casillas de un empujón. Los enemigos se alejan 3 casillas y los aliados, 1.
creatureAbility.bigBark.description.PT: Um latido alto que causa dano e empurra as criaturas em 3 células de distância. Os inimigos são empurrados em 3 células, e os aliados em 1.

creatureAbility.Dodge.description.EN: This creature is ready to dodge the next direct attack.
creatureAbility.Dodge.description.FR: Cette créature est prête à esquiver la prochaine attaque directe.
creatureAbility.Dodge.description.DE: Diese Kreatur ist bereit, dem nächsten direkten Angriff auszuweichen.
creatureAbility.Dodge.description.IT: Si prepara a schivare il successivo attacco diretto.
creatureAbility.Dodge.description.ZH: 此生物准备好躲避下一次直接攻击。
creatureAbility.Dodge.description.ZH-TW: 此生物準備好閃避下一次直接攻擊。
creatureAbility.Dodge.description.ES: Esta criatura está lista para esquivar el siguiente ataque directo.
creatureAbility.Dodge.description.PT: Esta criatura está pronta para desviar do próximo ataque direto.

creatureAbility.basicAttack.description.EN: Slap some sense into that fool!

creatureAbility.walkBump.description.EN: You should not be reading this

creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.EN: Set up a shield around Axobubble, protecting allies. Enemies are damaged, pushed away and cannot enter the dome until it breaks or expires.
creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.FR: Dressez un bouclier autour d'Axobubble pour protéger les alliés. Les ennemis subissent des dégâts, sont repoussés et ne peuvent pas entrer dans le dôme jusqu'à ce que celui-ci se brise ou expire.
creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.DE: Errichtet um Axobubble herum einen Schild, um Verbündete zu schützen. Gegner erleiden Schaden, werden zurückgestoßen und können die Kuppel nicht betreten, bis sie zerstört wird oder verschwindet.
creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.IT: Genera uno scudo intorno a Axobubble che protegge gli alleati e ferisce e respinge i nemici, che non potranno varcare la barriera finché questa non sarà distrutta o svanita.
creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.ZH: 在 Axobubble 周围设置一个防护罩，保护盟友。敌人会受到伤害且被推开，无法进入防护罩，直至其破裂或失效。
creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.ZH-TW: 在 Axobubble 周圍形成護盾保護盟友。敵人會受到傷害並被推開，且在護盾被破壞或失效前無法進入其中。
creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.ES: Coloca un escudo alrededor de Axobubble que protege a sus aliados. Los enemigos reciben daño, son alejados de un empujón y no pueden acceder a la cúpula hasta que se rompe o caduca.
creatureAbility.defensiveDome.descriptio.PT: Erga um escudo ao redor de Axobubble, protegendo os aliados. Inimigos sofrem dano, são afastados e só entram no domo quando ele se quebra ou expira.

creatureAbility.stompAttack.description.EN: Stomp damages the targeted entity, and stuns it for a short while.

creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.EN: Barks at a target, pushing it 4 cells away, dealing moderate damage.
creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.FR: Aboie sur une cible, la repoussant de 4 cases et lui infligeant des dégâts modérés.
creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.DE: Brüllt ein Ziel an, stößt es 3 Felder zurück und fügt ihm moderaten Schaden zu.
creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.IT: Grida contro un bersaglio, respingendolo di 3 caselle e infliggendo danni moderati.
creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.ZH: 对一个目标喊叫，将其推到 3 个格子之外，造成中等伤害。
creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.ZH-TW: 對一個目標吼叫，將其推開 3 格，造成中量傷害。
creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.ES: Grita a un objetivo y lo aleja 3 casillas, lo que le provoca un daño moderado.
creatureAbility.ShoutBorn.description.PT: Grita para um alvo, empurrando-o em 3 células de distância, causando dano moderado.

creatureAbility.unstoppableForce.descrip.EN: This creature gets immune to any movement impeding effects for a while.

creatureAbility.dodgeReaction.descriptio.EN: Who's a good dodger? You're a good dodger!

creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.EN: Bites a nearby creature. If that creature tries to hurt an ally during its turn, it will be bitten again for extra damage.
creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.FR: Mord une créature proche. Si cette créature tente de blesser un allié pendant son tour, elle sera mordue à nouveau et subira des dégâts supplémentaires.
creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.DE: Beißt eine Kreatur in der Nähe. Sollte sie in ihrer Runde versuchen, einen Verbündeten zu verletzen, wird sie erneut gebissen und erleidet zusätzlichen Schaden.
creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.IT: Morde una creatura vicina. Se durante il suo turno tenta di ferire un alleato, la vittima del morso viene colpita di nuovo subendo ulteriori danni.
creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.ZH: 啃咬附近的一个生物。如果该生物在它的回合中试图伤害一名盟友，它将再次被咬，受到额外伤害。
creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.ZH-TW: 咬附近的一個生物。如果該生物在自身回合內試圖傷害盟友，則會再被咬一次，造成額外傷害。
creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.ES: Muerde a una criatura cercana. Si esa criatura intenta herir a un aliado en su turno, la volverá a morder para provocarle daño adicional.
creatureAbility.assertDominance.descript.PT: Morde uma criatura próxima. Se essa criatura tentar machucar um aliado durante seu turno, ela será mordida novamente e sofrerá dano extra.

creatureAbility.clashStance.description.EN: This creature gets ready to counter-attack. Next time an enemy strikes it, and until its next turn, this creature will strike back with proportional force.
creatureAbility.clashStance.description.FR: Cette créature se prépare à contre-attaquer. La prochaine fois qu'un ennemi la touchera, et jusqu'à son prochain tour, elle ripostera avec une force proportionnelle.
creatureAbility.clashStance.description.DE: Diese Kreatur macht sich zum Gegenangriff bereit. Wenn sie bis zu ihrer nächsten Runde das nächste Mal von einem Gegner angegriffen wird, kontert sie mit proportionaler Wucht.
creatureAbility.clashStance.description.IT: Questa creatura si prepara a contrattaccare. Se un nemico la aggredisce, e fino al turno successivo, reagisce con un attacco di pari potenza.
creatureAbility.clashStance.description.ZH: 此生物准备好反击。下次有敌人攻击它时，直至它的下一个回合，这个生物将以相等的力量进行反击。
creatureAbility.clashStance.description.ZH-TW: 此生物準備好進行反擊。直到牠的下回合，下次受到敵人時，此生物會用等比例的力道反擊。
creatureAbility.clashStance.description.ES: Esta criatura se prepara para contraatacar. La próxima vez que un enemigo la golpee y hasta su siguiente turno, la criatura contraatacará con una fuerza equivalente.
creatureAbility.clashStance.description.PT: Essa criatura se prepara para contra-atacar. Da próxima vez que um inimigo a atingir e até seu próximo turno, essa criatura atacará com força proporcional.

creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.EN: Jump over obstacles in a line. If the last obstacle is an enemy, Bitebit attacks it.
creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.FR: Saute par-dessus les obstacles. Si le dernier obstacle est un ennemi, Bitebit l'attaque.
creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.DE: Springt in einer Linie über Hindernisse. Wenn das letzte Hindernis ein Gegner ist, wird ihm absoluter Schaden zugefügt.
creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.IT: Salta gli ostacoli in linea retta. Se l'ultimo ostacolo è un nemico, lo attacca infliggendo danni puri.
creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.ZH: 跳过一排的障碍物。如果最后一个障碍物是敌人，会对其造成真实伤害。
creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.ZH-TW: 躍過直線上的障礙物。如果最後一個障礙物是敵人，攻擊敵人可造成真實傷害。
creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.ES: Salta sobre los obstáculos en fila. Si el último es un enemigo, lo atacará y le provocará daño de verdad.
creatureAbility.backlineDrop.description.PT: Pule obstáculos em uma linha. Se o último obstáculo for um inimigo, atacá-lo causará dano verdadeiro.

creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.EN: Steals life from the target. The more life the target has, the better!
creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.FR: Vole la santé de la cible. Plus elle en a, mieux c'est !
creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.DE: Raubt dem Ziel Leben. Je mehr Leben es hat, desto besser!
creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.IT: Sottrae energia vitale al bersaglio. Più la vittima è in salute, meglio è!
creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.ZH: 偷取目标的生命。目标的生命值越多，效果越好！
creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.ZH-TW: 竊取目標的生命值。目標生命值越高越好！
creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.ES: Le roba la vida al objetivo. ¡Así que cuanta más vida tenga, mejor!
creatureAbility.LifeforceSink.descriptio.PT: Rouba a vida do alvo. Quanto mais vida o alvo tiver, melhor!

creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.EN: Jump on a target, dealing damage depending on its missing health. Can bounces twice to other targets. Grants up to 3 Catrenaline stacks.
creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.FR: Se jette sur une cible, lui infligeant des dégâts en fonction de sa santé manquante. Peut se rediriger à deux reprises vers d'autres cibles. Accorde jusqu'à 3 cumuls de Chadrénaline.
creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.DE: Springt auf ein Ziel und fügt ihm Schaden in Höhe seiner fehlenden LP zu. Kann zu zwei weiteren Zielen springen. Verleiht bis zu 3 „Adrekrallin“-Stapel.
creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.IT: Salta sul bersaglio, infliggendo danni proporzionali alla salute mancante. Può rimbalzare due volte su altri bersagli. Fornisce fino a 3 accumuli di Gatrenalina.
creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.ZH: 跳到一个目标上，根据其缺失的生命值造成伤害。可弹跳到其他目标上两次。可叠加最多三层肾上猫素。
creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.ZH-TW: 跳到一個目標上，根據其損失的生命值造成傷害。可以跳到其他目標上兩次。最多賦予 3 層喵喵腎上腺素疊加。
creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.ES: Salta sobre un objetivo e inflige daño según la vida que le falte. Puede rebotar dos veces en otros objetivos. Proporciona hasta 3 acumulaciones de Felinalina.
creatureAbility.bouncingClaws.descriptio.PT: Pule em um alvo, causando dano com base na vida perdida dele. Pode saltar duas vezes para outros alvos. Concede até 3 acúmulos de Adrenalina Felina.

creatureAbility.FlyingEvade.description.EN: This creature believes it can fly.
creatureAbility.FlyingEvade.description.FR: Cette créature pense qu'elle peut voler.
creatureAbility.FlyingEvade.description.DE: Diese Kreatur glaubt, fliegen zu können.
creatureAbility.FlyingEvade.description.IT: Questa creatura si convince di poter volare.
creatureAbility.FlyingEvade.description.ZH: 此生物相信自己可以飞。
creatureAbility.FlyingEvade.description.ES: Esta criatura cree que puede volar.
creatureAbility.FlyingEvade.description.PT: Esta criatura acredita que pode voar.

creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.EN: Take off to prepare a devastating dive attack next turn
creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.FR: Décollez pour préparer une attaque en piqué dévastatrice au prochain tour.
creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.DE: Hebt ab, um nächste Runde einen verheerenden Sturzangriff auszuführen.
creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.IT: Spicca il volo per prepararsi a un devastante attacco in tuffo nel turno successivo.
creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.ZH: 起飞，准备在下一回合发动毁灭性的俯冲攻击
creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.ZH-TW: 起飛，準備在下回合發動高殺傷力的俯衝攻擊。
creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.ES: Despega para preparar un ataque en picado devastador en el siguiente turno.
creatureAbility.FlyingDrop.description.PT: Decole para preparar um ataque devastador de investida no próximo turno.

creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.EN: Strike an enemy, then jump back out of reach.
creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.FR: Frappez un ennemi, puis sautez en arrière pour vous mettre hors de portée.
creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.DE: Greift einen Gegner an und springt dann außer Reichweite.
creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.IT: Colpisce un nemico e indietreggia con un salto fuori dalla sua portata.
creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.ZH: 对一个敌人发动攻击，然后跳回至其无法攻击的位置。
creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.ZH-TW: 攻擊敵人，再向後跳出範圍。
creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.ES: Ataca a un enemigo y luego salta hacia atrás para salir de su alcance.
creatureAbility.AttackAndBack.descriptio.PT: Atinja um inimigo e depois pule para longe do alcance dele.

creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.EN: Trigger a strong gust of wind that causes damage and pushes creatures in 3-cells line.
creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.FR: Déclenche une forte rafale de vent qui inflige des dégâts sur 3 cases consécutives et repousse les créatures.
creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.DE: Entfesselt eine starke Böe, die auf 3 Feldern in einer Reihe Schaden verursacht.
creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.IT: Genera una raffica di vento che infligge danni per 3 caselle in linea retta.
creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.ZH: 发动一阵强风，对排成一排的 3 个格子造成伤害。
creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.ZH-TW: 刮起一陣強風，會對連續 3 格造成傷害。
creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.ES: Lanza una fuerte ráfaga de viento que causa daño en 3 casillas seguidas.
creatureAbility.SharpGust.description.PT: Lance uma rajada de vento forte que causará dano por 3 células consecutivas.

creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.EN: Use raw Ether power to strike a target for heavy damage.
creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.FR: Utilisez la puissance brute de l'Ether pour atteindre une cible et lui infliger de lourds dégâts.
creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.DE: Setzt reine Ätherkraft ein, um einem Ziel schweren Schaden zuzufügen.
creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.IT: Convoglia la potenza eterea per infliggere danni devastanti a un bersaglio.
creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.ZH: 使用原始的以太力量来攻击目标，造成严重伤害。
creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.ZH-TW: 用純粹的乙太力量攻擊目標，造成大量傷害。
creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.ES: Usa pura potencia de éter para atacar a un objetivo y causarle daño grave.
creatureAbility.EtherBlast.description.PT: Usa o poder de Éter bruto para atingir um alvo e causar dano grave.

creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.EN: Deal true damage based on the target's current HP and significantly weaken their defenses until the start of their second turn.
creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.FR: Inflige des dégâts bruts basés sur les PV actuels de la cible et affaiblit considérablement ses défenses jusqu'au début de son deuxième tour.
creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.DE: Füge wahren Schaden basierend auf den aktuellen LP des Ziels zu und schwäche ihre Verteidigung bis zum Beginn ihres zweiten Zuges deutlich.
creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.IT: Infliggi danni veri basati sugli HP attuali del bersaglio e indebolisci significativamente le sue difese fino all'inizio del suo secondo turno.
creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.ZH: 根据目标当前的生命值造成真实伤害，并在他们的第二回合开始之前显著削弱他们的防御。
creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.ZH-TW: 根據目標當前的生命值造成真實傷害，並在他們的第二回合開始之前顯著削弱他們的防禦。
creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.ES: Inflige daño verdadero basado en los PV actuales del objetivo y debilita significativamente sus defensas hasta el comienzo de su segundo turno.
creatureAbility.TankBuster.description.PT: Causa dano verdadeiro com base nos atuais PV do alvo e enfraquece significativamente suas defesas até o início de seu segundo turno.

creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.EN: Expel 3 explosive waves that deal damage to all nearby cells.
creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.FR: Provoquez 3 vagues explosives qui infligent des dégâts à toutes les cases à proximité.
creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.DE: Entsendet drei explosive Wellen, die auf allen Feldern in der Nähe Schaden verursachen.
creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.IT: Genera 3 ondate esplosive che infliggono danni a tutte le caselle vicine.
creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.ZH: 释放 3 道爆炸波，对附近所有格子造成伤害。
creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.ZH-TW: 發出 3 次爆炸波，對附近所有格子造成傷害。
creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.ES: Expele 3 oleadas explosivas que infligen daño a todas las casillas cercanas.
creatureAbility.ComboBreaker.description.PT: Expele 3 ondas explosivas que causam dano a todas as células nas proximidades.

creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.EN: Consume the target's Hype Points to heal it, and greatly decrease their damage until the end of their next turn.
creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.FR: Consomme les Points d'Exaltation de la cible pour la soigner et réduit grandement ses dégâts jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.
creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.DE: Verbrauche die Hype-Punkte des Ziels, um es zu heilen, und verringere seinen Schaden bis zum Ende seines nächsten Zuges stark.
creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.IT: Consuma i Punti di Frenesia del bersaglio per curarlo e riduci notevolmente il suo danno fino alla fine del suo prossimo turno.
creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.ZH: 消耗目标的炒劲点来治愈它，并且大幅降低他们的伤害，直到他们下一回合结束。
creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.ZH-TW: 消耗目標的炒勁點來治癒它，並且大幅降低他們的傷害，直到他們下一回合結束。
creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.ES: Consume los Puntos de Euforia del objetivo para curarlo y reduce en gran medida su daño hasta el final de su próximo turno.
creatureAbility.AppeaseFeelings.descript.PT: Consome os Pontos de Frenesi do alvo para curá-lo e diminui muito o dano dele até o final de seu próximo turno.

creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.EN: Heals an entity at the cost of its own health.
creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.FR: Soigne une entité en puisant dans sa propre santé.
creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.DE: Heilt eine Kreatur auf Kosten der eigenen LP.
creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.IT: Cura il bersaglio sacrificando la propria salute.
creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.ZH: 以自己的生命值为代价治疗一个单位。
creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.ZH-TW: 消耗自己的生命值治療一個實體。
creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.ES: Cura a una entidad a cambio de su propia vida.
creatureAbility.LifeCycle.description.PT: Cura uma entidade pelo preço de sua própria vida.

creatureAbility.Root.description.EN: Prevents a target from moving, being pushed or pulled for 2 seconds

creatureAbility.LeavesRain.description.EN: Heals all living things on the map

creatureAbility.dumbCharge.description.EN: Charges at a target with complete disregard for its own health. His management approves.

creatureAbility.JumpBomb.description.EN: Jump on cell, damaging nearby entities

creatureAbility.BearsSafe.description.EN: Steal hypes from nearby enemies, hyping his team

creatureAbility.FreshGreens.description.EN: Uses his body in a legal way to heal the target creature

creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.EN: Every fourth effect that should be applied to Dipking fails - including when coming from allies' abilities.
creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.FR: Chaque quatrième effet censé s'appliquer à Dipking échoue, y compris ceux provenant des capacités des alliés.
creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.DE: Jeder vierte Effekt, der Dipking betrifft, schlägt fehl. Das umfasst auch Effekte von verbündeten Fähigkeiten.
creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.IT: Ogni quarto effetto applicato a Dipking manca il bersaglio, inclusi quelli provenienti dalle abilità degli alleati.
creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.ZH: 本应施加于 Dipking 的第四次效果都会失效，包括来自盟友招数的效果。
creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.ZH-TW: Dipking 每承受四個效果，其中第四個會失效，包含盟友技能的效果。
creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.ES: Cada cuarto efecto que debería aplicársele a Dipking falla, aunque proceda de las habilidades de sus aliados.
creatureAbility.SlipperySkin.description.PT: Todo quarto efeito que deveria ser aplicado ao Dipking falha, inclusive se vier das habilidades de aliados.

creatureAbility.Throwback.description.EN: Throw a target behind, dealing light damage.
creatureAbility.Throwback.description.FR: Projetez une cible en arrière, lui infligeant des dégâts légers.
creatureAbility.Throwback.description.DE: Wirft ein Ziel hinter sich und verursacht leichten Schaden.
creatureAbility.Throwback.description.IT: Lancia il bersaglio all'indietro, infliggendogli danni lievi.
creatureAbility.Throwback.description.ZH: 将一个目标扔到后面，造成轻微伤害。
creatureAbility.Throwback.description.ZH-TW: 把一個目標向後丟，造成少量傷害。
creatureAbility.Throwback.description.ES: Lanza a un objetivo hacia atrás y le inflige un poco de daño.
creatureAbility.Throwback.description.PT: Joga um alvo para trás, causando dano leve.

creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.EN: Roots the target and boosts its defenses until the end of its next turn.
creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.FR: Enracine la cible et augmente ses défenses jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.
creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.DE: Wurzelt das Ziel fest und erhöht seine Abwehr für 4 Zeiteinheiten.
creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.IT: Radica a terra il bersaglio e ne incrementa le difese per 4 turni.
creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.ZH: 使目标定身，并提升其防御力，持续 4 时间单位。
creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.ZH-TW: 使目標紮根，並使該目標的防禦提升 4 時間單位。
creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.ES: Inmoviliza al objetivo y potencia sus defensas durante 4 unidades de tiempo.
creatureAbility.RootsEmbrace.description.PT: Enraíza o alvo e aumenta suas defesas por 4 TU.

creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.EN: Block Choy gives all his hype to his friends, gives them a temporary movement range boost and hastens their next turn.
creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.FR: Block Choy émule ses compagnons, leur donne un boost temporaire de portée et accélère leur prochain tour.
creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.DE: Block Choy gibt seinen Hype an seine Freunde weiter und verleiht ihnen vorübergehend Bewegungsreichweite und in ihrer nächsten Runde Eile.
creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.IT: Block Choy cede tutto il suo hype agli alleati, aumentandone brevemente il raggio di movimento e affrettando il loro turno successivo.
creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.ZH: Block Choy 将其所有的超能点数都给予盟友，并为其提供临时的移动范围增益，且让其的下一个回合更快到来。
creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.ZH-TW: Block Choy 將自己所有的興奮值給他的朋友，使朋友暫時獲得移動距離加成，並加快該朋友的下一個回合。
creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.ES: Block Choy les da a sus amigos todo su entusiasmo y un impulso de alcance de movimiento temporal, además de acelerar su próximo turno.
creatureAbility.Vitamins.description.PT: Block Choy dá todo seu Hype para os amigos, além de um aumento de alcance de movimento temporário, e acelera o próximo turno dele.

creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.EN: If any ally is about to get hit, this creature will jump to the rescue and cancel the attack, dealing light damage.
creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.FR: Si un allié est sur le point d'être touché, cette créature sautera à la rescousse et neutralisera l'attaque, infligeant des dégâts légers.
creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.DE: Wenn ein Verbündeter gleich getroffen wird, springt diese Kreatur dazwischen, unterbricht den Angriff und verursacht leichten Schaden.
creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.IT: Se un alleato sta per essere colpito, questa creatura interviene in suo aiuto e annulla l'attacco, infliggendo danni lievi.
creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.ZH: 如果任何盟友即将被击中，此生物会跳去救援并取消攻击，造成轻微伤害。
creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.ZH-TW: 如果任何盟友即將被擊中，此生物就會跳去救援，取消該攻擊，並造成少量傷害。
creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.ES: Si algún aliado está a punto de ser golpeado, esta criatura saltará para rescatarlo y cancelará el ataque, lo que provoca un poco de daño.
creatureAbility.BodyGuard.description.PT: Se qualquer aliado estiver prestes a ser atingido, essa criatura pulará para salvá-lo e cancelará o ataque, causando dano leve.

creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.EN: Shiba has up to +40 physical power, +40 ether power and +6 move range depending on how badly his allies are hurt.
creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.FR: En fonction de la gravité de la blessure de ses alliés, Shiba bénéficie d'une Puissance Physique allant jusqu'à +40, d'une Puissance Ether allant jusqu'à +40 et de Points de Mouvement allant jusqu'à +6.
creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.DE: Shiba verfügt abhängig davon, wie schwer verletzt seine Verbündeten sind, über bis zu +40 Physische Kraft, +40 Ätherkraft und +6 Bewegungsreichweite.
creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.IT: Shiba riceve fino a +40 potenza fisica, +40 potenza eterea e +6 raggio di movimento, in base alla gravità dei danni subiti dai suoi alleati.
creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.ZH: Shiba 最多可以拥有 +40 物理强度，+40 以太强度和 +6 移动距离 ，取决于他的盟友受伤害的严重程度。
creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.ZH-TW: Shiba 根據盟友的受傷程度，最多可獲得 +40 物理威力、+40 乙太威力和 +6 移動距離。
creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.ES: Shiba tiene hasta +40 de potencia física, +40 de potencia de éter y +6 de alcance de movimiento, según el daño que estén sufriendo sus aliados.
creatureAbility.shibaPassive.description.PT: Shiba ganha até +40 de poder físico, +40 de poder de éter e +6 de alcance de movimento, dependendo da gravidade dos ferimentos dos aliados.

creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.EN: Gain Catrenaline stacks when dealing damage with special abilities. Each stack adds an extra strike to the basic attack.
creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.FR: Gagnez des cumuls de Chadrénaline lorsque vous infligez des dégâts avec des capacités spéciales. Chaque cumul ajoute un coup supplémentaire à l'attaque de base.
creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.DE: Erhalte „Adrekrallin“-Stapel, wenn du mit bestimmten Fähigkeiten Schaden verursachst. Jeder Stapel fügt dem normalen Angriff einen zusätzlichen Hieb hinzu.
creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.IT: Accumula Gatrenalina quando infligge danni con abilità speciali. Ogni accumulo aggiunge un colpo all'attacco base.
creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.ZH: 用特殊招数造成伤害时可叠加肾上猫素层数。每层都能为基本攻击增加一次额外攻击次数。
creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.ZH-TW: 用特殊技能造成傷害時獲得喵喵腎上腺素疊加。每層疊加使基本攻擊額外攻擊一次。
creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.ES: Obtienes acumulaciones de Felinalina cuando infliges daño con habilidades especiales. Cada acumulación suma golpes adicionales al ataque básico.
creatureAbility.bitebitPassive.descripti.PT: Ganhe acúmulos de Adrenalina Felina ao causar dano com habilidades especiais. Cada acúmulo adiciona um ataque extra ao básico.

creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.EN: Zzoo lets out an air-tearing shriek when hurt, dealing damage to nearby creatures.
creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.FR: Zzoo pousse un cri strident lorsqu'il est blessé, infligeant des dégâts aux créatures à proximité.
creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.DE: Zzoo stößt ein Kreischen aus, das die Luft zerreißt und Kreaturen in der Nähe Schaden zufügt.
creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.IT: Se subisce una ferita, Zzoo emette un grido terrificante che infligge danni alle creature vicine.
creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.ZH: Zzoo 在受伤时会发出令人撕心裂肺的尖叫声，对附近的生物造成伤害。
creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.ZH-TW: Zzoo 受傷時發出震耳欲聾的尖叫，對附近的生物造成傷害。
creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.ES: Cuando lo hieren, Zzoo deja escapar un chillido desgarrador que daña a las criaturas cercanas.
creatureAbility.PainfulShriek.descriptio.PT: Quando machucado, Zzoo solta um grito que rompe o ar, causando dano às criaturas próximas.

creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.EN: When moving, Dinobit can end its walk on a cell occupied by another creature, pushing it away.
creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.FR: Lorsqu'il se déplace, Dinobit peut terminer sa course sur une case occupée par une autre créature, la repoussant alors.
creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.DE: Wenn Dinobit sich bewegt, kann er auf einem Feld stehenbleiben, das bereits von einer Kreatur belegt ist, um sie zurückzustoßen.
creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.IT: Quando si muove, Dinobit può fermarsi su una casella occupata da un'altra creatura, respingendola.
creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.ZH: 移动时，Dinobit 可以停在另一个生物占据的格子上，并将其推开。
creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.ZH-TW: Dinobit 移動時可結束在已被其他生物佔據的格子，並將該生物推開。
creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.ES: Al moverse, Dinobit puede terminar su recorrido en una casilla ocupada por otra criatura y, en ese caso, la empujará para sacarla de ese lugar.
creatureAbility.dinobitPassive.descripti.PT: Ao se mover, Dinobit pode terminar sua caminhada em uma célula ocupada por outra criatura, empurrando-a para longe.

creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.EN: This ability will be revealed when it gets used.
creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.FR: Cette capacité sera révélée lors de son utilisation.
creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.DE: Diese Fähigkeit wird bei Benutzung enthüllt.
creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.IT: Questa abilità sarà rivelata dopo l'uso.
creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.ZH: 将在使用后揭晓此招数。
creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.ZH-TW: 這個技能會在使用時揭曉。
creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.ES: Esta capacidad se manifestará cuando se use.
creatureAbility.MysteryAbility.descripti.PT: Esta habilidade será revelada quando for usada.

creatureAbility.GroundControl.descriptio.EN: Any hostile moving in the direct vicinity will be painfully shown the way out.

creatureAbility.JumpScare.description.EN: Remove Ectoplasm marks from nearby enemies, dealing damage and healing Number 9 proportionally. Number 9 can play again after this.

creatureAbility.ScarringAttack.descripti.EN: Wound an enemy, greatly reducing its defense and increasing the damage it receives for a while.

creatureAbility.SoulConduit.description.EN: Teleport to any empty location. If a creature had fainted there, you can Move and use an Ability again this turn.

creatureAbility.number9Passive.descripti.EN: Number 9 can only interact with marked creatures. To mark a creature, Number 9 must fly through them. If the creature is an enemy, Number 9 gains 2 Hype points.

creatureAbility.Pulltergeist.description.EN: Pulls a target 4 cells toward current position, dealing little damage.

creatureAbility.NoEscape.description.EN: Until next turn, next enemy moving to or from a nearby cell gets pulled behind, taking light damage

creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.EN: If this creature gets targeted by an attack during next turn, its HP and Hype points will be swapped with its aggressor.
creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.FR: Si cette créature est ciblée par une attaque au cours du prochain tour, ses PV et points d'Émulation seront échangés avec son assaillant.
creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.DE: Wenn diese Kreatur in der nächsten Runde Ziel eines Angriffs wird, werden ihre LP und ihre Hype-Punkte mit dem Angreifer getauscht.
creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.IT: Se questa creatura subisce un attacco nel turno successivo, i suoi PS e punti hype vengono scambiati con quelli dell'aggressore.
creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.ZH: 如果此生物在下一回合被视为攻击目标，它的生命值和超能点数将与攻击者互换。
creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.ZH-TW: 如果此生物在下回合中成為攻擊的目標，則其生命值與興奮值將與攻擊者對調。
creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.ES: Si esta criatura recibe un ataque en el siguiente turno, sus PV y puntos de entusiasmo se intercambiarán con los de su agresor.
creatureAbility.fateSwap.description.PT: Se esta criatura for alvo de um ataque durante o próximo turno, seus pontos de vida e de Hype serão trocados com quem a atacou.

creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.EN: Axobubble's tail attacks are ranged and push creatures back. Can target allies.
creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.FR: Les coups de queue d'Axobubble sont des attaques à distance qui repoussent les créatures. Peut cibler les alliés.
creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.DE: Die Schwanzangriffe von Axobubble sind Fernkampfangriffe und stoßen Kreaturen zurück. Auch gegen Verbündete einsetzbar.
creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.IT: Gli attacchi di coda di Axobubble colpiscono a distanza e respingono le creature. Possono ferire anche gli alleati.
creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.ZH: Axobubble 用尾巴发动范围攻击，并将生物推回。可对盟友发动。
creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.ZH-TW: Axobubble 的尾巴攻擊改為遠程攻擊，並會將生物推開。可以盟友為目標。
creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.ES: Los ataques con la cola de Axobubble son a larga distancia y empujan a las criaturas hacia atrás. Puede fijar como objetivos a aliados.
creatureAbility.tailekinesis.description.PT: Os ataques da cauda de Axobubble são de longo alcance e empurram as criaturas para trás. Pode atingir aliados.

creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.EN: Throw a bubble bomb that delays creatures hit and pushes them away. Direct hit applies more damage and a stun.
creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.FR: Lancez une bombe à bulles qui retarde les créatures touchées et les repousse. Un coup direct inflige plus de dégâts et provoque un étourdissement.
creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.DE: Wirft eine Blasenbombe, die getroffene Kreaturen verzögert und zurückstößt. Direkte Treffer verursachen mehr Schaden und betäuben.
creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.IT: Lancia una bomba a bolla che rallenta le creature colpite e le respinge. I colpi diretti infliggono danni maggiori e stordimento.
creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.ZH: 抛出一个气泡炸弹，推开被击中的生物，并推迟其行动。直接命中能造成更多伤害并使目标眩晕。
creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.ZH-TW: 丟出一個泡泡炸彈，能延遲擊中生物，並推開牠們。直接命中會造成較高的傷害，並造成暈眩。
creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.ES: Lanza una burbuja bomba que retrasa los golpes de las criaturas y las aleja de un empujón. Los impactos directos infligen más daño y aturdimiento.
creatureAbility.pressureBomb.description.PT: Atire uma bomba de bolhas que atrasa as criaturas atingidas e as afasta. O acerto direto causa mais dano e aplica atordoamento.

creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.EN: Teleports away, bringing along all nearby creatures.
creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.FR: Se téléporte, entraînant avec lui toutes les créatures à proximité.
creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.DE: Teleportiert sich davon und nimmt Kreaturen in der Nähe mit.
creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.IT: Teletrasporta altrove, portando con sé tutte le creature vicine.
creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.ZH: 带着附近所有的生物瞬移离开。
creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.ZH-TW: 傳送離開，並帶走附近所有生物。
creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.ES: Se teletransporta y se lleva a todas las criaturas cercanas.
creatureAbility.bubbleOut.description.PT: Teletransporta-se para longe, levando junto todas as criaturas nas proximidades.

creatureAbility.Overtake.description.EN: If attacked at close range before next turn, jump behind the aggressor and play your next turn ealier.

creatureAbility.RainbowFlash.description.EN: Instantly dash in a straight line for 5 cells through obstacles, dealing damage to any creatures on the way.

creatureAbility.ComeAndPlay.description.EN: Charge in a straight line, throwing the first encountered creature behind, dealing damage.

creatureAbility.Kickback.description.EN: Kicks away the creature directly behind, or the next to coming there before next turn.

creatureAbility.Inspiring.description.EN: The first time Unika moves each turn, it leaves behind an inspiring mark that any creature can pick up. The mark moves the creature 3 Time Units back, and restores the ability to Move if it was already used.

creatureAbility.Encore.description.EN: For the cost of Encore, use last ability again with a 25% damage increase buff.

creatureAbility.TastyMint.description.EN: Each turn, the first time Chocomint moves, it leaves behind a mark that any creature can pick up to get a shield.

creatureAbility.FreshCherry.description.EN: Throw a protective bomb that explodes in a cross pattern. Affected allies will avoid the next direct attack.

creatureAbility.RottenCherry.description.EN: Toss a bomb that deals damage in a cross pattern.

creatureAbility.FrostyMood.description.EN: Purge all buffs and debuffs of the next creature to move within range.

creatureAbility.MightyMint.description.EN: Reduce enemy Ether Defenses and shield allies nearby.

creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.EN: Bob focuses his energy into waiting harder, pushing him down the timeline and forcing the next creature to play sooner than expected.
creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.FR: Bob concentre son énergie pour mieux attendre, ce qui le fait évoluer dans le temps et oblige la créature suivante à jouer plus tôt que prévu.
creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.DE: Bob konzentriert all seine Energie darauf, noch leidenschaftlicher zu warten. Er rutscht in der Zeitleiste nach hinten und zwingt die nächste Kreatur zum Zug.
creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.IT: Bob infonde tutta la sua energia nell'attesa, retrocedendo nella linea temporale e costringendo la creatura successiva ad agire prima del previsto.
creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.ZH: Bob 将精力集中到“厚积薄发”上，将自己推到时间轴后方，迫使下一个生物提前行动。
creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.ZH-TW: Bob 全神貫注更認真等待，使他在時間線上往後移，強迫下一個生物提早開始行動。
creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.ES: Bob concentra su energía en esperar con más empeño, lo que acelera la línea temporal y obliga a la siguiente criatura a jugar antes de lo esperado.
creatureAbility.waitHarder.description.PT: Bob foca sua energia em esperar mais, voltando na Linha do Tempo e forçando a próxima criatura a jogar antes do que o esperado.

creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.EN: Jump on cell, damaging nearby entities.
creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.FR: Saute sur une case, endommageant les entités proches.
creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.DE: Springt auf das Feld und fügt Kreaturen in der Nähe Schaden zu.
creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.IT: Salta sulla casella, infliggendo danni alle entità circostanti.
creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.ZH: 跳到一个格子上，对附近单位造成伤害。
creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.ZH-TW: 跳到一個格子上，對附近的實體造成傷害。
creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.ES: Salta sobre una casilla y daña a las entidades cercanas.
creatureAbility.disruptiveDrop.descripti.PT: Pule em uma célula, causando dano a entidades próximas.

creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.EN: Charge at a target with complete disregard for its own health. His management approves.
creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.FR: Charge une cible en ignorant totalement son intégrité physique. Approuvé par la direction.
creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.DE: Stürmt ohne Rücksicht auf die eigene Gesundheit zum Ziel. Sein Chef wäre stolz auf ihn.
creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.IT: Carica verso il bersaglio senza alcun riguardo per la propria incolumità, e per la gioia dei superiori.
creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.ZH: 完全不顾自己的生命值，向一个目标发起冲锋。已经过管理部门批准。
creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.ZH-TW: 不顧自己的生命值，朝目標衝鋒。他的主管非常滿意。
creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.ES: Arremete contra un objetivo con total desprecio por su propia vida. Sus jefes aprueban su acción.
creatureAbility.frontlineWorker.descript.PT: Corre até um alvo sem se importar com a própria vida. A gerência aprova.

creatureAbility.stomp.description.EN: Stomp damages the targeted entity and stuns it for 5 TU.
creatureAbility.stomp.description.FR: Piétinement inflige des dégâts à l'entité ciblée et l'étourdit pour 5 UT (unités temporelles).
creatureAbility.stomp.description.DE: Fügt der Zielkreatur Schaden zu und betäubt sie für 5 Zeiteinheiten.
creatureAbility.stomp.description.IT: Infligge danni al bersaglio e lo stordisce per 5 turni.
creatureAbility.stomp.description.ZH: 重踏并伤害目标单位，同时使其眩晕 5 回合。
creatureAbility.stomp.description.ZH-TW: 踩踏會對目標實體造成傷害，並使其暈眩 5 時間單位。
creatureAbility.stomp.description.ES: El pisotón daña a la entidad objetivo y la aturde durante 5 unidades de tiempo.
creatureAbility.stomp.description.PT: Pisotear causa dano à entidade que for alvo e a atordoa por 5 Unidades de Tempo.

creatureAbility.noEscape.description.EN: Next enemy moving to or from a nearby cell gets pulled behind, taking light damage.
creatureAbility.noEscape.description.FR: Le prochain ennemi se déplaçant vers ou depuis une case avoisinante est repoussé, subissant des dégâts légers.
creatureAbility.noEscape.description.DE: Der nächste Gegner, der sich von oder zu einem Feld in der Nähe bewegt, wird nach hinten gezogen und erleidet leichten Schaden.
creatureAbility.noEscape.description.IT: Il primo nemico a muoversi verso o da una casella vicina viene trascinato indietro, subendo lievi danni.
creatureAbility.noEscape.description.ZH: 下一个前往或来自附近格子的敌人会被拉到后面，受到轻微伤害。
creatureAbility.noEscape.description.ZH-TW: 下一個前往或離開附近格子的敵人被往後拉，並受到少量傷害。
creatureAbility.noEscape.description.ES: El siguiente enemigo que venga de una casilla cercana o vaya hacia ella será empujado hacia atrás y sufrirá un poco de daño.
creatureAbility.noEscape.description.PT: O próximo inimigo a se mover de ou para uma célula nas proximidades é puxado para trás, sofrendo dano leve.

creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.EN: Remove Ectoplasm marks from nearby enemies, pulling them and dealing damage and healing Number 9 proportionally. Number 9 can use an Ability or Attack again afterward.
creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.FR: Retirez les marques d'ectoplasme des ennemis proches, en les attirant et infligeant des dégâts, tout en soignant le Numéro 9 de manière proportionnelle. Le Numéro 9 peut ensuite utiliser une capacité ou attaquer à nouveau.
creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.DE: Entferne Ektoplasmamarkierungen von nahen Feinden, ziehe sie an und füge ihnen Schaden zu, während Nummer 9 proportional geheilt wird. Nummer 9 kann danach eine Fähigkeit oder einen Angriff erneut verwenden.
creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.IT: Rimuovi i segni di ectoplasma dai nemici vicini, attirandoli e infliggendo danni e curando il Numero 9 proporzionalmente. Il Numero 9 può poi utilizzare una Abilità o un Attacco di nuovo.
creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.ZH: 移除附近敌人的 ectoplasm 标记，将它们拉过来并造成伤害，同时按比例治疗第九号。第九号随后可以再次使用一个技能或进行攻击。
creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.ZH-TW: 移除附近敵人的 ectoplasm 標記，將它們拉過來並造成傷害，同時按比例治療第九號。第九號隨後可以再次使用一個技能或進行攻擊。
creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.ES: Elimina las marcas de ectoplasma de los enemigos cercanos, atrayéndolos y causándoles daño y curando al Número 9 de manera proporcional. El Número 9 puede luego usar una Habilidad o Atacar de nuevo.
creatureAbility.jumpscare.description.PT: Remova as marcas de ectoplasma dos inimigos próximos, puxando-os e causando dano e curando o Número 9 de forma proporcional. O Número 9 pode usar uma Habilidade ou Atacar novamente em seguida.

creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.EN: Wound an enemy, greatly reducing its defense and increasing the damage it receives for the next attack.
creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.FR: Blessez un ennemi, réduisant fortement sa défense et augmentant les dégâts reçus lors de la prochaine attaque.
creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.DE: Verwundet einen Gegner, um seine Abwehr enorm zu verringern und den Schaden des nächsten erlittenen Angriffs zu erhöhen.
creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.IT: Ferisce un nemico, riducendone nettamente la difesa e incrementando i danni subiti dall'attacco successivo.
creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.ZH: 伤害一个敌人，大幅降低其防御力，并提高其下一次受到的攻击伤害。
creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.ZH-TW: 使一名敵人受傷，大幅降低對方的防禦，並大幅提高對方下一次攻擊受到的傷害。
creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.ES: Hiere a un enemigo, lo que reduce mucho su defensa y aumenta el daño que recibe en el siguiente ataque.
creatureAbility.scarringStrike.descripti.PT: Fira um inimigo, reduzindo grande parte da defesa dele e aumentando o dano que ele sofrerá do próximo ataque.

creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.EN: Pulls a target 4 cells toward current position, dealing little damage. Removes the Ectoplasm mark.
creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.FR: Tire une cible de 4 cellules vers la position actuelle, infligeant peu de dégâts. Supprime la marque d'Ectoplasme.
creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.DE: Zieht ein Ziel um 4 Zellen in Richtung aktueller Position und verursacht geringen Schaden. Entfernt die Ektoplasma-Markierung.
creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.IT: Tira un bersaglio di 4 celle verso la posizione attuale, infliggendo pochi danni. Rimuove il marchio di Ectoplasma.
creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.ZH: 将目标向当前位置拉动4个单元格，造成轻微伤害。移除异质标记。
creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.ZH-TW: 將目標向當前位置拉動4個儲存格，造成輕微傷害。移除異質標記。
creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.ES: Arrastra un objetivo 4 celdas hacia la posición actual, infligiendo poco daño. Elimina la marca de Ectoplasma.
creatureAbility.pulltergeist.description.PT: Puxa um alvo em 4 células em direção à posição atual, causando pouco dano. Remove a marca de Ectoplasma.

creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.EN: Teleport to any empty location. If a creature had fainted there, 5 Hype points are refunded and you can Move and use an Ability again this turn.
creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.FR: Téléportez-vous vers n'importe quel emplacement vide. Si une créature avait perdu connaissance là-bas, 5 points d'Exaltation sont remboursés et vous pouvez vous Déplacer et utiliser à nouveau une Capacité ce tour-ci.
creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.DE: Teleportiere dich an einen beliebigen leeren Ort. Wenn dort bereits ein Wesen besiegt wurde, werden 5 Hype-Punkte erstattet und du kannst dich in diesem Zug erneut bewegen und eine Fähigkeit einsetzen.
creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.IT: Teletrasportati in qualsiasi posizione vuota. Se una creatura è svenuta lì, verranno rimborsati 5 Punti Frenesia e puoi Muoverti e utilizzare nuovamente un'Abilità in questo turno.
creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.ZH: 传送至任意空地。如果有生物在那里失去意识，将返还5点炒劲点，本回合你可以再次移动并使用一项能力。
creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.ZH-TW: 傳送至任意空地。如果有生物在那裡失去意識，將返還5點炒勁點，本回合你可以再次移動並使用一項能力。
creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.ES: Teletranspórtate a cualquier ubicación vacía. Si una criatura ha perdido el conocimiento allí, se reembolsan 5 puntos de Euforia y puedes Moverte y usar una Habilidad nuevamente en este turno.
creatureAbility.soulConduit.description.PT: Teleporte-se para qualquer local vazio. Se uma criatura tiver desmaiado lá, 5 pontos de Frenesi são reembolsados e você pode se Mover e usar uma Habilidade novamente neste turno.

creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.EN: Jump to a cell, pushing enemies away. You can play another ability after this.
creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.FR: Bondit sur une case en repoussant les ennemis. Vous pouvez ensuite utiliser une autre compétence.
creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.DE: Springt auf ein Feld. Diese Fähigkeit zählt als Bewegung, also kannst du danach angreifen.
creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.IT: Salta ad una casella, respingendo gli avversari. Un'altra abilità può essere usata subito dopo.
creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.ZH: 跳到一个格子上。此招数算作一次行动，你可以在使用之后发动攻击。
creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.ZH-TW: 跳到一個格子上。此技能屬於移動，使用後可以進行攻擊。
creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.ES: Salta hacia una casilla empujando a los enemigos. Se puede usar otra habilidad despues de esto.
creatureAbility.groundControl.descriptio.PT: Pule em uma célula, empurrando os inimigos para longe. Você pode usar outra habilidade em seguida.

creatureAbility.encore.description.EN: For the cost of Encore, use last ability again with a 25% damage increase buff.
creatureAbility.encore.description.FR: Avec un bonus de dégâts de 25 %, utilisez à nouveau la dernière capacité pour le coût de Encore.
creatureAbility.encore.description.DE: Setzt für die Kosten von „Zugabe“ die letzte Fähigkeit mit einem Schadensbonus von 25 % erneut ein.
creatureAbility.encore.description.IT: Al costo di Bis, usa di nuovo l'ultima abilità eseguita con un bonus di 25% ai danni.
creatureAbility.encore.description.ZH: 消耗“再来一回”，再次使用最后一次使用过的招数，且附带 25% 的伤害提高增益。
creatureAbility.encore.description.ZH-TW: 消耗安可，再次使用上次的技能，並附加 25% 傷害提升增益。
creatureAbility.encore.description.ES: A cambio de la Repetición, vuelve a usar la última habilidad con una ventaja de aumento del 25 %.
creatureAbility.encore.description.PT: Pelo custo de Repetir, use a última habilidade novamente com um aumento de 25% de dano.

creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.EN: Instantly dash in a straight line for 5 cells through obstacles, dealing damage to any creatures on the way.
creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.FR: Courez instantanément en ligne droite sur 5 cases au travers des obstacles, en infligeant des dégâts à toutes les créatures sur votre passage.
creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.DE: Saust sofort in einer geraden Linie 5 Felder weit und durchquert Hindernisse. Fügt Kreaturen auf dem Weg Schaden zu.
creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.IT: Scatta in linea retta per 5 caselle attraversando gli ostacoli e infliggendo danni alle creature presenti lungo il percorso.
creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.ZH: 立即以直线向前冲刺 5 格，穿过障碍物，对途中的一切生物造成伤害。
creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.ZH-TW: 立刻直線衝刺 5 格，穿越障礙物，並對途中的任何生物造成傷害。
creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.ES: Se abalanza al instante en línea recta, recorre 5 casillas a través de obstáculos e inflige daño a las criaturas que encuentra a su paso.
creatureAbility.rainbowFlash.description.PT: Corra instantaneamente em uma linha reta por 5 células através de obstáculos, causando dano a quaisquer criaturas que estejam no caminho.

creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.EN: Charge in a straight line, throwing the first encountered creature behind, dealing damage.
creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.FR: Chargez en ligne droite, projetant la première créature rencontrée derrière vous et lui infligeant des dégâts.
creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.DE: Stürmt in einer geraden Linie vor, wirft die erste Kreatur auf dem Weg hinter sich und fügt ihr Schaden zu.
creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.IT: Carica in linea retta, lanciando all'indietro la prima creatura che incontra e infliggendole danni.
creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.ZH: 直线冲锋，将第一个遇到的生物扔到后面，并对其造成伤害。
creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.ZH-TW: 朝直線衝鋒，將碰到的生物向後丟，造成傷害。
creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.ES: Arremete en línea recta y lanza hacia atrás a la primera criatura que encuentra, causándole daño.
creatureAbility.comeAndPlay.description.PT: Corra em uma linha reta, jogando a primeira criatura que encontrar para trás e causando dano.

creatureAbility.kickback.description.EN: This creature will kick the next creature behind it.
creatureAbility.kickback.description.FR: Cette créature attaque la prochaine créature derrière elle.
creatureAbility.kickback.description.DE: Diese Kreatur tritt die nächste Kreatur hinter sich.
creatureAbility.kickback.description.IT: La creatura sferra un calcio al primo nemico che si posizioni alle sue spalle.
creatureAbility.kickback.description.ZH: 这个生物会踢它身后的下一个生物。
creatureAbility.kickback.description.ZH-TW: 此生物會踢下一個在後面的生物。
creatureAbility.kickback.description.ES: Esta criatura le dará una patada a la próxima criatura que tenga detrás.
creatureAbility.kickback.description.PT: Esta criatura chutará a criatura que estiver atrás dela.

creatureAbility.overtake.description.EN: If attacked at close range before next turn, jump behind the aggressor and play its next turn ealier.
creatureAbility.overtake.description.FR: Si vous êtes attaqué à bout portant avant votre prochain tour, sautez derrière l'agresseur et jouez votre prochain tour plus tôt.
creatureAbility.overtake.description.DE: Wenn du vor nächster Runde auf kurze Distanz angegriffen wirst, springst du hinter den Angreifer und bist früher dran.
creatureAbility.overtake.description.IT: Se subisce un attacco ravvicinato prima del turno successivo, salta alle spalle dell'aggressore e inizia in anticipo il proprio turno.
creatureAbility.overtake.description.ZH: 如果在下一回合前受到近距离攻击，就会跳到攻击者后面并提前开始下一回合。
creatureAbility.overtake.description.ZH-TW: 如果在下回合前受到近距離攻擊，則跳到攻擊者後方，並提早開始自己的下一個回合。
creatureAbility.overtake.description.ES: Si recibe un ataque a corta distancia antes del siguiente turno, salta detrás del agresor y juega su siguiente turno antes.
creatureAbility.overtake.description.PT: Se atacado em curto alcance antes do próximo turno, pule atrás do agressor e jogue o próximo turno dele mais cedo.

creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.EN: Throw a protective bomb that explodes in a cross pattern. Affected allies will Dodge the next direct attack. Expires at the start of the affected ally's turn.
creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.FR: Lancez une bombe protectrice qui explose en forme de croix. Les alliés touchés esquiveront la prochaine attaque directe. Expire au début du tour de l'allié affecté.
creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.DE: Wirf eine schützende Bombe, die sich in einem Kreuzmuster explodiert. Betroffene Verbündete werden dem nächsten direkten Angriff ausweichen. Verfällt zu Beginn des Zuges des betroffenen Verbündeten.
creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.IT: Lancia una bomba protettiva che esplode a forma di croce. Gli alleati colpiti schiveranno il prossimo attacco diretto. Scade all'inizio del turno dell'alleato colpito.
creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.ZH: 投掷一颗保护性炸弹，爆炸成十字形。受影响的盟友将躲避下一次直接攻击。在受影响盟友的回合开始时失效。
creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.ZH-TW: 投擲一顆保護性炸彈，爆炸成十字形。受影響的盟友將躲避下一次直接攻擊。在受影響盟友的回合開始時失效。
creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.ES: Lanza una bomba protectora que explota en forma de cruz. Los aliados afectados esquivarán el próximo ataque directo. Expira al comienzo del turno del aliado afectado.
creatureAbility.freshCherry.description.PT: Arremesse uma bomba protetora que explode em um padrão em cruz. Aliados afetados irão esquivar do próximo ataque direto. Expira no início do turno do aliado afetado

creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.EN: Toss a bomb that deals damage in a cross pattern.
creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.FR: Lancez une bombe qui inflige des dégâts en forme de croix.
creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.DE: Wirf eine Bombe, die Schaden in Form eines Kreuzes verursacht.
creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.IT: Lancia una bomba che infligge danni in un pattern a croce.
creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.ZH: 投掷一颗爆炸成十字形的炸弹，对敌人造成伤害。
creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.ZH-TW: 投擲一顆爆炸成十字形的炸彈，對敵人造成傷害。
creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.ES: Lanza una bomba que causa daño en un patrón de cruz.
creatureAbility.rottenCherry.description.PT: Arremesse uma bomba que causa dano em um padrão em cruz.

creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.EN: Purge buffs and debuffs from the next creature to move within range
creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.FR: Supprime les améliorations et les affaiblissements de la prochaine créature à se déplacer dans la zone
creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.DE: Entferne Verstärkungen und Schwächungen von der nächsten Kreatur, die sich innerhalb der Reichweite bewegt
creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.IT: Rimuovi i potenziamenti e gli indebolimenti dalla prossima creatura che si muove entro il raggio
creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.ZH: 从下一个移动到范围内的生物身上清除增益和减益效果
creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.ZH-TW: 從下一個移動到範圍內的生物身上清除增益和減益效果
creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.ES: Elimina los beneficios y perjuicios de la siguiente criatura que se mueva dentro del rango
creatureAbility.frostyMood.description.PT: Remove os buffs e debuffs da próxima criatura a se mover dentro do alcance

creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.EN: Place a shield on nearby allies, and reduce enemy Ether Defenses by 90%.
creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.FR: Place un bouclier sur les alliés à proximité et réduit les défenses d'éther de l'ennemi de 90%.
creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.DE: Platziere einen Schild auf nahegelegenen Verbündeten und reduziere die Äther-Verteidigung des Feindes um 90%.
creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.IT: Applica uno scudo agli alleati vicini e riduce le difese di Ether del nemico del 90%.
creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.ZH: 为附近的盟友施加一个护盾，并将敌方的以太防御降低90%。
creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.ZH-TW: 為附近的盟友施加一個護盾，並將敵方的乙太防禦降低90%。
creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.ES: Coloca un escudo en los aliados cercanos y reduce las defensas de éter del enemigo en un 90%.
creatureAbility.mightyMint.description.PT: Coloca um escudo nos aliados próximos e reduz as defesas de Éter do inimigo em 90%.

creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.EN: Blockchoy's aura lightly heals any creatures ending its turn nearby.
creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.FR: L'aura de Block Choy soigne légèrement toutes les créatures achevant leur tour à proximité.
creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.DE: Block Choys Aura heilt Kreaturen, die in der Nähe ihre Runde beenden, leicht.
creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.IT: L'aura di Block Choy cura le creature che concludono il proprio turno nelle vicinanze.
creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.ZH: Block Choy 的光环可以略微治疗附近结束其回合的一切生物。
creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.ZH-TW: Block Choy 的氣場能為附近結束回合的生物提供少量治療。
creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.ES: El aura de Block Choy cura un poco a cualquier criatura que termine su turno cerca.
creatureAbility.freshGreens.description.PT: A aura de Blockchoy cura levemente qualquer criatura que termine o turno nas proximidades.

creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.EN: Bob makes a satisfying noise when he's hit. This grants Hype to his attackers.
creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.FR: Bob émet un son gracieux lorsqu'il est touché. Confère de l'Émulation à ses attaquants.
creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.DE: Bob macht ein befriedigendes Geräusch, wenn er getroffen wird. Angreifer erhalten dadurch Hype.
creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.IT: Bob emette un suono piacevole quando subisce un colpo, fornendo hype a chi attacca.
creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.ZH: Bob 被击中时，会发出愉悦之声。这会使他的攻击者得到超能点数。
creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.ZH-TW: Bob 被擊中時發出清脆的聲響，使攻擊者獲得興奮值。
creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.ES: Bob emite un sonido de satisfacción cuando lo golpean. Esto proporciona entusiasmo a sus atacantes.
creatureAbility.satisfyingNoise.descript.PT: Bob faz um ruído agradável quando é atingido. Isso garante Hype a seus agressores.

creatureAbility.passession.description.EN: Number 9 can only interact with marked creatures. To mark a creature, Number 9 must fly through them. If the creature is an enemy, Number 9 gains 1 Hype point.
creatureAbility.passession.description.FR: Number 9 ne peut interagir qu'avec des créatures marquées. Pour marquer une créature, Number 9 doit la traverser en volant. Si la créature est un ennemi, Number 9 gagne 1 point d'Émulation.
creatureAbility.passession.description.DE: Number 9 kann nur mit markierten Kreaturen interagieren. Um eine Kreatur zu markieren, muss Number 9 durch sie hindurchfliegen. Sollte es sich um einen Gegner handeln, erhält Number 9 1 Hype-Punkt.
creatureAbility.passession.description.IT: Number 9 può interagire solo con le creature marchiate. Per marchiare una creatura, deve attraversarla in volo. Se la creatura è un nemico, Number 9 ottiene 1 punto hype.
creatureAbility.passession.description.ZH: Number 9 只能与被标记的生物互动。要标记一个生物，Number 9 必须飞过它们。如果该生物是一个敌人，Number 9 会获得 1 点超能点数。
creatureAbility.passession.description.ZH-TW: Number 9 只能和被標記的生物互動。Number 9 必須穿透生物，才能進行標記。如果該生物是敵人，則 Number 9 獲得 1 點興奮值。
creatureAbility.passession.description.ES: Number 9 solo puede interactuar con criaturas marcadas. Para marcar a una criatura, Number 9 debe atravesarla volando. Si la criatura es un enemigo, Number 9 obtiene 1 punto de entusiasmo.
creatureAbility.passession.description.PT: Number 9 só pode interagir com as criaturas marcadas. Para marcar uma criatura, Number 9 deve voar através dela. Se a criatura for um inimigo, Number 9 ganha 1 ponto de Hype.

creatureAbility.inspiring.description.EN: Each turn, the first time Unika moves, it leaves behind an inspiring mark that any creature can pick up to get an extra move.
creatureAbility.inspiring.description.FR: À chaque tour, lors du premier mouvement d'Unika, ce dernier laisse derrière lui une marque d'inspiration que toute créature peut ramasser pour obtenir un déplacement supplémentaire.
creatureAbility.inspiring.description.DE: Unika hinterlässt bei der ersten Bewegung jede Runde eine inspirierende Markierung, die andere Kreaturen aufsammeln können, damit sie sich erneut bewegen können.
creatureAbility.inspiring.description.IT: A ogni turno, la prima volta che Unika si muove lascia dietro di sé un segno di incoraggiamento che fornisce un movimento bonus a chi lo raccoglie.
creatureAbility.inspiring.description.ZH: 每一回合，当 Unika 第一次移动时，会留下一个鼓舞人心的标记，任何生物都可以拾取此标记，以获得一次额外的移动机会。
creatureAbility.inspiring.description.ZH-TW: Unika 每回合第一次移動時，會留下鼓舞記號。任何生物都能撿起該記號，並獲得一次額外行動機會。
creatureAbility.inspiring.description.ES: En cada turno, la primera vez que mueve Unika, deja atrás una marca inspiradora que cualquier criatura puede recoger para recibir un movimiento adicional.
creatureAbility.inspiring.description.PT: A cada turno, na primeira vez que Unika se mover, deixa para trás uma marca inspiradora que qualquer criatura pode pegar para receber um movimento extra.

creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.EN: Each turn, Chocomint's first move leaves behind a mark that grants a shield.
creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.FR: À chaque tour, le premier mouvement de Chocomint laisse une marque qui accorde un bouclier.
creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.DE: Jede runde hinterlässt Chocomints erster Zug eine Markierung, die einen Schild gewährt.
creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.IT: Ogni turno, la prima mossa di Chocomint lascia un segno che garantisce uno scudo.
creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.ZH: 每回合，Chocomint的第一次行动会留下一个印记，授予一个护盾。
creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.ZH-TW: 每回合，Chocomint的第一次行動會留下一個印記，授予一個護盾。
creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.ES: En cada turno, el primer movimiento de Chocomint deja una marca que otorga un escudo.
creatureAbility.tastyMint.description.PT: A cada turno, o primeiro movimento do Chocomint deixa uma marca que concede um escudo.

creatureAbility.defenseDown.description.ZH: 物理 / 以太防御降低

creatureAbility.defenseUp.description.ZH: 物理 / 以太防御提高

creatureAbility.heal.description.ZH: 此生物正在获得持续治疗。
creatureAbility.heal.description.ZH-TW: 此生物會持續受到治療。
creatureAbility.heal.description.ES: Esta criatura se está curando con el tiempo.
creatureAbility.heal.description.PT: Esta criatura está recebendo cura ao longo do tempo.

creatureAbility.hypeDown.description.EN: This creature's Hype is temporary lowered.
creatureAbility.hypeDown.description.FR: L'Émulation de cette créature est temporairement réduite.

creatureAbility.hypeDown.description.ES: El entusiasmo de esta criatura se encuentra temporalmente reducido.
creatureAbility.hypeDown.description.PT: O Hype desta criatura está temporariamente reduzido.

creatureAbility.invisible.description.EN: This creature is not visible to enemies.

creatureAbility.moveRangeDown.descriptio.FR: L'entité a une capacité de mouvement réduite.

creatureAbility.moveRangeDown.descriptio.PT: A entidade tem alcance de movimento reduzido

creatureAbility.moveRangeUp.description.EN: The entity has an increased move range
creatureAbility.moveRangeUp.description.FR: L'entité a une capacité de mouvement augmenté.

creatureAbility.ectoplasmed.description.EN: This creature has been marked by a Number 9.

creatureAbility.overcharged.description.EN: This creature has used Overcharge to convert its Hype points into a temporary stats increase.
creatureAbility.overcharged.description.FR: Cette créature a utilisé Surcharge pour convertir ses points d'Émulation en une augmentation temporaire de ses statistiques.
creatureAbility.overcharged.description.DE: Diese Kreatur hat „Überladen“ eingesetzt, um ihre Hype-Punkte in vorübergehende Statuswerte umzuwandeln.
creatureAbility.overcharged.description.IT: Questa creatura ha utilizzato Sovraccarico per convertire i suoi punti hype in un incremento temporaneo dei propri valori.
creatureAbility.overcharged.description.ZH: 这个生物使用了“过度充能”，将它的超能点数转换为临时的属性加成。
creatureAbility.overcharged.description.ZH-TW: 此生物用「興奮過頭」轉換興奮值，暫時提升數值。
creatureAbility.overcharged.description.ES: Esta criatura ha usado Sobrecarga para convertir sus puntos de entusiasmo en un aumento temporal de sus atributos.
creatureAbility.overcharged.description.PT: Esta criatura usou Sobrecarregar para converter seus pontos de Hype em um aumento temporário de atributos.

creatureAbility.passThrough.description.EN: This creature can move through obstacles and other entities.
creatureAbility.passThrough.description.FR: Cette créature peut se déplacer à travers les obstacles et les autres entités.
creatureAbility.passThrough.description.DE: Diese Kreatur kann sich durch Hindernisse und andere Kreaturen bewegen.
creatureAbility.passThrough.description.IT: Questa creatura può attraversare ostacoli e altre entità.
creatureAbility.passThrough.description.ZH: 此生物在移动时可以通过障碍物和其他单位。
creatureAbility.passThrough.description.ZH-TW: 此生物能穿過障礙物和其他實體。
creatureAbility.passThrough.description.ES: Esta criatura puede atravesar obstáculos y a otras entidades.
creatureAbility.passThrough.description.PT: Esta criatura pode se mover através de obstáculos e outras entidades.

creatureAbility.powerUp.description.ZH: 物理 / 以太强度提高

creatureAbility.rooted.description.EN: This creature cannot move nor be displaced by external forces.
creatureAbility.rooted.description.FR: Cette créature ne peut pas bouger ni être déplacée par des forces extérieures.
creatureAbility.rooted.description.DE: Diese Kreatur kann sich nicht bewegen oder durch Einwirkung von außen bewegt werden.
creatureAbility.rooted.description.IT: Questa creatura non può muoversi né essere spostata da agenti esterni.
creatureAbility.rooted.description.ZH: 此生物不能移动，也不能被外部力量移动位置。
creatureAbility.rooted.description.ZH-TW: 此生物無法移動，也無法因外力移位。
creatureAbility.rooted.description.ES: Esta criatura no se puede mover y tampoco puede ser desplazada por fuerzas externas.
creatureAbility.rooted.description.PT: Essa criatura não pode se mover ou ser deslocada por forças externas.

creatureAbility.shield.description.EN: Damage that would affect this creature is reduced.
creatureAbility.shield.description.FR: Les dégâts qui affectent cette créature sont réduits.
creatureAbility.shield.description.DE: Der Schaden, den diese Kreatur erleiden soll, wird verringert.
creatureAbility.shield.description.IT: Riduce i danni indirizzati a questa creatura.
creatureAbility.shield.description.ZH: 此生物受到的伤害会降低。
creatureAbility.shield.description.ZH-TW: 針對此生物的傷害降低。
creatureAbility.shield.description.ES: Reduce el daño que afectaría a esta criatura.
creatureAbility.shield.description.PT: O dano que afetaria esta criatura é reduzido.

creatureAbility.silence.description.EN: This creature cannot use hype-based abilities.
creatureAbility.silence.description.FR: Cette créature ne peut pas utiliser les capacités utilisant l'Émulation.
creatureAbility.silence.description.DE: Diese Kreatur kann keine Hype-Fähigkeiten einsetzen.

creatureAbility.silence.description.ZH: 此生物无法使用超能招数。
creatureAbility.silence.description.ZH-TW: 此生物無法用需要興奮值的技能。
creatureAbility.silence.description.ES: Esta criatura no puede usar habilidades basadas en el entusiasmo.
creatureAbility.silence.description.PT: Esta criatura não pode usar habilidades com base em Hype.

creatureAbility.stunned.description.EN: This creature cannot act nor react.
creatureAbility.stunned.description.FR: Cette créature ne peut ni agir ni réagir.
creatureAbility.stunned.description.DE: Diese Kreatur kann keine Aktionen oder Reaktionen ausführen.
creatureAbility.stunned.description.ZH: 此生物无法行动，也无法做出反应。
creatureAbility.stunned.description.ZH-TW: 此生物無法行動，也無法做出反應。
creatureAbility.stunned.description.ES: Esta criatura no actúa ni reacciona.
creatureAbility.stunned.description.PT: Esta criatura não pode agir ou reagir.

creatureAbility.untargetable.description.IT: Questa creatura non può essere presa di mira.
creatureAbility.untargetable.description.ES: Esta criatura no se puede fijar como objetivo.
creatureAbility.untargetable.description.PT: Esta criatura não pode ser um alvo.

creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.EN: Whenever Zzoo takes damages, he lets out a powerfull shriek damaging nearby creatures.
creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.FR: Chaque fois que Zzoo est touché, il pousse un cri strident qui inflige des dégâts aux créatures à proximité.
creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.DE: Wenn Zzoo Schaden erleidet, stößt er ein lautstarkes Kreischen aus, das Kreaturen in der Nähe Schaden zufügt.
creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.IT: Quando Zzoo subisce danni, emette un potente grido che ferisce le creature vicine.
creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.ZH: 每当 Zzoo 受到伤害时，他就会发出一声有力的尖叫，伤害附近的生物。
creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.ZH-TW: Zzoo 受到傷害時會大聲尖叫，對附近的生物造成傷害。
creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.ES: Cuando Zzoo recibe daño, emite un poderoso chillido que daña a las criaturas cercanas.
creatureAbility.disuasiveShriek.descript.PT: Sempre que Zzoo sofre dano, solta um poderoso grito que causa dano às criaturas próximas.
